item.title: Israel will begin talks to free all hostages, Netanyahu says
item.description: Earlier this week, a Hamas source said the armed group had agreed to a temporary ceasefire proposal from mediators.

item.title: Appeals court throws out Trump's $500m civil fraud penalty
item.description: In its 323-page ruling, the New York judges stated that the fine was excessive, and likely violated the US Constitution.

item.title: French streamer's death 'not due to trauma', autopsy finds
item.description: The online personality known as Jean Pormanove was found dead in his home in Nice on Monday.

item.title: If a Putin-Zelensky summit takes place, where could it be?
item.description: Geneva, Istanbul and Budapest have been put forward as potential locations - but bilateral talks still remain a long way off.

item.title: UK backs call for Israel to allow foreign media into Gaza
item.description: Governments from 27 countries, including France and Germany, say journalists in Gaza must be protected.
